ðŸ“– Summary: AirRemote is a solution that transforms traditional IR-controlled devices into smart, remotely accessible appliances. It captures and stores IR signals from any remote, allowing users to replay these commands via a web interface or through automated routines. This enables users to control devices remotely, create automated actions, and manage all their remotes in one place.
